Summary: All i can say is wow!!!!
text:
Just when you open the jar for the very first time is amazing! Honey has a tremendous amount of benefits! I eat a table spoon before going to work and the gym. It really gives you an energy boost, which is a lot better then those energy drinks!!! It also helped me to get rid of a cold that I was starting to catch.
I also recommend you to read
Honey: The Gourmet Medicine (Paperback)
by Joe Traynor (Author)

So what are you waiting for!!! Go get your Manuka Honey!!!
